MERGE INTO TIMERSUM T USING (SELECT TO_CHAR(SUM(E.END_T - S.START_T)*24*60, '99999') TOTAL FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY STARTNO) SR, START_T, MEMBERID FROM TIMERSTART WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberid} ) S, ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ENDNO) ER, END_T, MEMBERID FROM TIMEREND WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberid} ) E WHERE S.SR = E.ER AND TO_CHAR(S.START_T, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') ) A ON ( T.TODAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND T.MEMBERID = #{memberid} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE
T.TOTAL_T = A.TOTAL
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (T.MEMBERID, T.TOTAL_T, T.TODAY) VALUES (#{memberid}, A.TOTAL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') )
